message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1400000. I understand its worth to you is $1200000, but I hope this price reflects a fair compromise that allows both parties to benefit. I look forward to your response and the possibility of conducting a transaction that benefits us both.
